decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1, 2, 4, unnumbered location plan, unnumbered design and access statement, received 25/06/2013, 3 Revision A, received 02/08/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility (except for the existing brick pillar) exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.
Condition : 4 - The crossover will be constructed to a maximum width of 3.6m
Condition : 5 - The front boundary wall must be reinstated following the completion of the works except at the point of access
description: Formation of vehicle access to the front of the property with associated hard standing.
